items.name: Nevis Brick Builder's Bay
items.short_description: Dive into a world of endless creativity where kids can design and construct their own island wonders using thousands of LEGO bricks. Interactive building stations and design challenges await young architects.

items.name: Island Architect's Workshop
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor space dedicated to imaginative play with LEGO DUPLO and traditional LEGO sets. Special workshops on engineering and robotics are offered for older children.

items.name: Nevis Construct-a-Coaster
items.short_description: This unique park allows children to design and test their own mini-roller coasters and car tracks using specialized LEGO components. A fun and educational experience for budding engineers.

items.name: Volcano Brick Lab
items.short_description: Explore volcanic geology through LEGO models and build your own lava flows and island landscapes. Learn about Nevis's natural history in a fun, hands-on way.

items.name: Mango Tree Maze & Play
items.short_description: A multi-level soft play structure featuring slides, tunnels, ball pits, and climbing frames. Perfect for children to burn off energy on a hot or rainy day.

items.name: Pirate Ship Playhouse
items.short_description: Kids can embark on a grand adventure aboard a themed indoor pirate ship, complete with cannons, a lookout deck, and treasure hunt challenges. Suitable for younger buccaneers.

items.name: Rainforest Rascals Funhouse
items.short_description: An eco-friendly indoor play center designed with natural materials, offering rope bridges, treehouse-style climbing, and a dedicated toddler zone. Focus on active and exploratory play.

items.name: Nevis Bounce House Bonanza
items.short_description: Featuring multiple inflatable bounce houses, obstacle courses, and slides, this center is a high-energy haven for kids of all ages. Safety-supervised fun guaranteed.

items.name: Pelican Splash Pad
items.short_description: A vibrant zero-depth water play area with interactive jets, tipping buckets, and gentle slides, perfect for toddlers and younger children. Shaded areas and seating for parents available.

items.name: Coconut Creek Water Fun
items.short_description: Featuring a lazy river, a multi-lane racing slide, and a dedicated shallow pool with a water playground. A fun escape from the heat for families.

items.name: Monkey Hill Rapids
items.short_description: Experience thrilling tube slides and an adventure water course with waterfalls and sprayers. Designed for slightly older children seeking more excitement.

items.name: Charlestown Aqua Park
items.short_description: An inflatable obstacle course anchored just offshore, offering climbing, jumping, and sliding fun directly in the calm Caribbean Sea. Life vests provided.

items.name: Nevis Island Puppet Troupe
items.short_description: Charming traditional puppet shows bringing local folklore and Caribbean tales to life. Interactive storytelling and meet-and-greet with the puppets after each performance.

items.name: The Great Sugar Mill Circus
items.short_description: A family-friendly mini-circus featuring local acrobats, clowns, jugglers, and a ringmaster with hilarious antics. Held in a colorful tent, offering dazzling entertainment for all ages.
items.address: Near Golden Rock Estate, Gingerland, Nevis

items.name: Nevis Sea Critters Puppet Show
items.short_description: An educational and entertaining puppet show focused on marine life and ocean conservation. Learn about the creatures inhabiting Nevis's waters through fun, engaging characters.
items.address: Nevis Marine Environmental Center, Cades Bay, Nevis

items.name: Caribbean Carousel Circus
items.short_description: A captivating, vibrant show featuring local and international performers in a blend of traditional circus acts and Caribbean dance. Seasonal performances only, check schedule.

items.name: Pinney's Beach Funland
items.short_description: A small, charming theme park right by the beach, offering classic kiddie rides like a mini Ferris wheel, carousel, and bumper boats. Perfect for younger children.

items.name: Nevis Monkey Kingdom Adventure
items.short_description: A jungle-themed park where children can explore miniature replica ruins, ride a gentle train through a 'rainforest,' and enjoy a variety of animal-themed rides. Meet friendly character mascots.

items.name: Caribbean Kids' Carnival
items.short_description: A colorful park celebrating Caribbean culture with themed rides, a small parade, and local craft stations. Enjoy vibrant music and tasty treats.

items.name: Nevis Sugar Mill Station
items.short_description: Step back in time at this history-themed park. Kids can ride a mini steam train, learn about sugar cane harvesting, and enjoy small rides reminiscent of old-time fairgrounds.

items.name: Green Pastures Petting Farm
items.short_description: Get up close and personal with friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, chickens, and rabbits. Kids can participate in feeding sessions and learn about farm life.

items.name: Nevis Eco-Farm & Gardens
items.short_description: A sustainable farm offering guided tours where children can see how fruits and vegetables grow, participate in planting activities, and taste fresh produce. Learn about organic farming.

items.name: Donkey Sanctuary & Rescue
items.short_description: Visit rescued donkeys and learn about their care and rehabilitation. Children can gently interact with these gentle creatures and help with grooming.

items.name: Pasture Play Barn
items.short_description: A rustic farm attraction with a play barn, hay bales for jumping, and opportunities to see chickens, pigs, and calves. Features seasonal events like pumpkin patches.

items.name: Nevis Little Explorers Museum
items.short_description: A hands-on museum designed for children aged 2-10, featuring exhibits on Nevisian history, nature, and culture. Interactive displays encourage learning through play.

items.name: Sugar & Spice Discovery Center
items.short_description: Explore the agricultural heritage of Nevis, focusing on sugar cane and local spices. Kids can grind cane, identify spices by smell, and learn about the island's economic past.

items.name: Marine Marvels Children's Museum
items.short_description: Dedicated to the wonders of the Caribbean Sea, this museum features touch tanks, virtual reality experiences, and exhibits on coral reefs, fish, and sea turtles.

items.name: Nevis Art & Imagination Gallery
items.short_description: A creative space where children can explore various art forms, create their own masterpieces, and learn about local Nevisian artists. Offers guided art workshops.

items.name: Mystical Monkey Magic Show
items.short_description: A delightful magic show filled with disappearing acts, card tricks, and captivating illusions. The magician, 'Professor Prickly,' often incorporates local Nevisian lore.

items.name: The Great Nevisian Vanishing Act
items.short_description: An interactive show where kids become part of the magic, helping the illusionist perform incredible feats. Expect lots of laughter and audience participation.

items.name: Island Enchantment Live
items.short_description: A charming storytelling and magic show combined, where tales of Nevisian history are interwoven with small, wondrous illusions that captivate young imaginations.

items.name: Nevis School of Wizardry
items.short_description: More than a show, this attraction offers short workshops where kids learn simple magic tricks and illusion techniques from a master magician. A fun, hands-on experience.
items.address: St. Kitts & Nevis College (Nevis Campus), Charlestown, Nevis

items.name: Charlestown Waterfront Carousel
items.short_description: A beautiful classic carousel featuring hand-painted animals and traditional carnival music. Located right on the waterfront, offering scenic views.

items.name: Mango Grove Mini Ferris Wheel
items.short_description: Enjoy gentle spins and panoramic views of the mango groves and distant sea from this charming mini Ferris wheel. Perfect for younger riders and families.

items.name: Volcano Venturer Kiddie Coaster
items.short_description: A small, exciting roller coaster designed for junior adventurers, taking them on a thrilling (but gentle) ride around a miniature volcano landscape.

items.name: Nevis Bumper Boats Lagoon
items.short_description: Kids can pilot their own colorful bumper boats in a safe, shallow lagoon. A splashy and fun way to cool off and enjoy friendly collisions.

items.name: Nevis STEM Discovery Hub
items.short_description: An interactive science center focusing on Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math. Features hands-on exhibits covering physics, biology, and local ecology.

items.name: Volcano Exploration Lab
items.short_description: Learn about Nevis's volcanic origins through dynamic displays, a mock volcano eruption, and geological experiments. Understand the science behind the island's formation.

items.name: Caribbean Climate Kids Center
items.short_description: An engaging center dedicated to climate science, renewable energy, and environmental conservation. Children can participate in 'green' experiments and understand climate impact.

items.name: Stars & Tides Observatory
items.short_description: Explore astronomy and oceanography with interactive models of the solar system, telescope viewing sessions (evenings), and exhibits on tides and marine currents.
